description: This file is an HTML source for a web-based database visualizer interface, including UI markup, styling, and embedded JavaScript for dynamic interactions with backend API endpoints to list databases, tables, and display table data.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases from the API and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list and resets the UI state.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses a database to show its tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Loads tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches data for a selected table and renders it.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Constructs an HTML table from data records.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders a table cell, handling large content and objects.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses a cell showing full content.
